The claim originated from a report by Lo: where he showed a list of companies pledging large amounts of money to Black Lives Matter.
Lou Dobbs later issued a correction stat: but for investments to address economic and racial inequality.
Despite the correction: pictures of the original list continued to be shared online, leading to the spread of the false claim.
Spokespeople for the companies mentioned: such as Pepsi, confirmed that they have not made any donations to Black Lives Matter.
